table.name: ob_refnum
table.description: Reference number, nickname or alternate ways to identify the order in the customer's internal systems. For e.g., the customer may have SAP, JDE applications that supply a different internal code for the order in GC3.

columns.name: ORDER_BASE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the order base.

columns.name: OB_REFNUM_QUAL_GID
columns.description: The reference qualifier GID defining the reference  code.

columns.name: OB_REFNUM_VALUE
columns.description: The value associated to the reference code.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
